ComicInfo.Summary:
The grand finale of Garth Ennis' first Jennifer Blood story arc finally arrives! Will Jennifer finally get her revenge? Will she stop her vigilante lifestyle and return to a life of normalcy with her family? Find out in Jennifer Blood #6!
Jennifer Blood's war against the mob that destroyed her family is coming to an end. Jennifer Blood is now down to her final target. She looks back at her life and how she came to be where she is today and what it means to her. Jennifer's perverted neighbor also surprises her in a very unique way.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-10 17:52:34. [CVDB301822]
